name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Michael A. REINHARD, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Michael A. REINHARD, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Carol K. McGinley, Asst. Public Defender, Aaron M. Matte, Allentown, for appellant.
William H. Platt, Dist. Atty., Allentown, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
445 A.2d 102
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Michael A. REINHARD, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 15, 1982.
Decided May 19, 1982.
Carol K. McGinley, Asst. Public Defender, Aaron M. Matte, Allentown, for appellant.
William H. Platt, Dist. Atty., Allentown, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
